subject: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit Recipes
msgSnippet: ... If you buy through Manning, you can get the PDF version free. They ship the PDF version to you immediately, then the print version comes through the mail.
messageBody:
Michael wrote:
> I ordered it from Amazon on June 16 and I am still waiting for my copy
> to ship. Amazon says it will ship by the 22nd, if not, I may cancel
> the order and buy the PDF version, although I really like having my
> books in book form, not electronic.

If you buy through Manning, you can get the PDF version free. They ship
the PDF version to you immediately, then the print version comes through
the mail.

www.manning.com/rainsberger

Bad news: you pay $50; Good news: you get both print and e-copy.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
